title: Bloomberg Markets: Bentley University's 'Future of Work'(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bentley University's 'Future of Work'(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Gloria Cordes Larson President Bentley University Discussing "The Future of Work: What It Means for Higher Education and the Next Generation of Graduates."Bentley University is a strategic partner of Bloomberg Radio. David Leaser Senior Program Executive of Innovation and Growth Initiatives IBM Discussing trends that are affecting jobs of the future as part of the Bentley University Future of Work special with Bentley President Gloria Larson. Tony Buono Management Professor Bentley University Discussing how the school is addressing the future of work with Bentley President Gloria Larson. David Stillman Author Discussing his book “GenZ@Work" on how the next generation is transforming the workplace with Bentley President Gloria Larson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
